htmlbody:
Featured articles in this edition include:

‘Contemporary Trends Of Deliberative Research: Synthesizing A New Study Agenda’, by Simon Beste

‘Stakeholder and Citizen Roles in Public Deliberation’, by David Kahane, Kristjana Loptson, Jade Herriman, and Max Hardy

‘Who Moderates the Moderators? The Effect of Non-neutral Moderators in Deliberative Decision Making’ by Paolo Spada and James Raymond Vreeland

‘Communities of fate and the challenges of international public participation in transnational governance contexts’, by Edna F. Einsiedel

‘Boundary Objects and Public Deliberation: Analyzing the Management of Boundary Tensions in the Consensus Conference’ by Hsin-Yi Yeh

‘Public Participation, Mayoral Control, and the New York City Public School System’ by Marco A. Castillo

‘What’s in a name? The search for ‘common ground’ in Kenora, Northwestern Ontario’ by James P. Robson Dr, Andrew J. Sinclair Dr., Iain J. Davidson-Hunt Dr., and Alan P. Diduck Dr.

‘The Varieties of Individual Engagement (VIE) Scales: Confirmatory Factor Analyses across Two Samples and Contexts’,  by Lisa M. PytlikZillig, Myiah J. Hutchens, Peter Muhlberger, Shiyuan Wang, Rabecca Harris, Jayme L. Neiman, and Alan J. Tomkins

 

Please find these, and other articles, essays and book reviews at: http://www.publicdeliberation.net/jpd/
title: New edition of the Journal of Public Deliberation
